## Product type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Product = {
    _id?: number;
    description: string;
    _categoriesRef: string[];
    name: string;
    sku: string;
    slug: string;
    images: string[];
    options: ProductOption[];
    galleryImages: string[];
    price: {
        special: number;
        regular: number;
    };
    reviews: {
        paginationInfo: {
            totalCount: number;
        };
    };
    averageRating: number;
    selectedVariant: ProductVariant | null;
    variants: ProductVariant[];
};
```
